The paper reports he is likely to urge lawmakers to work together to make the program solvent, without going into details, according to congressional sources. Progressives had worried Barack Obama might embrace the growing call from Republicans to make significant changes to the way Social Security works. " Even by the low standards of recent Education Secretaries, Michael Gove strikes me as being particularly out of his depth and reliant on simplistic ideologies for his policies. Which is all very well once you have the facts and understanding. Which is, of course, why we have schools. Facts, can exist without understanding, by the way.
